name: CVE-2022-32614
description: In audio, there is a possible memory corruption due to a logic error. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07310571; Issue ID: ALPS07310571.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:12.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6893:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8797:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8365:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8168:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6855:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6879:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6983:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8798:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:m6789:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
